channel.title: tulpa on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in tulpa on Chege's Blog

item.title: Swamp Thing
item.description: The Swamp Thing. Image from dccomics.com Motifs Love and Loyalty Their master gone, the un-men pause, uncertain of what to do… They must among themselves for a moment – and, at least, a decision is reached. For all their existence, they have followed their master blindly – wherever he might lead… And there seems no good reason to change that situation now. [Liz] He’s kept her safely shut away for years.

item.title: The Department of Truth
item.description: The Department of Truth | Image Comics. James Tynion IV; Martin Simmonds. imagecomics.com . Accessed Feb 18, 2022. Department of Truth (2020 - present) by James Tynion IV. Image from imagecomics.com Expecting a modern take on 1984, which I didn’t finish because I lost interest. Plot Points [Lee Harvey Oswald] The more people believe in something, the more true that thing becomes.
